description: 📚 Amazon Alexa skill to update books and their properties in my Notion database. Leverages Notion API, Google Books API, and Alexa Skills Kit.
🪐 Image-sharing from the final frontier. An Instagram clone web-app developed for the Shopify front-end developer intern challenge for summer 2022.
👾 A simple command line hangman game implemented in Python using object oriented programming and Wordnik's random-word API.
🐍 Implemented snake game using pygame to apply object oriented programming.
👑 Created a 3 level Sokoban game using arrays, implementing dynamic character movement and a cozy pixel theme.
💻 Developed personal portfolio website to showcase experience and skills.
